TUTO_2: Welcome to the tutorial of Eurostat's Energy monthly visualisation tool. This guided tour will show you the main ways of interacting with the tool.
TUTO_4: Click on any point of the time-line chart to access in chart options, it is possible to further disaggregate them into sub-categories or to explore some other statistics such as time graphs, pie charts or bar charts to compare the different consumption levels for the selected country.
TUTO_6: without release the mouse you can select a time period to see in detail.
TUTO_8: In addition to the time-line chart options, the tool contains a menu for additional features. Click on the menu icon to customize the chart. Click next to learn about the menu options.
TUTO_10: Use this option to change the chart to table.
TUTO_12: Use this menu to access the tutorial or metadata or send some feedback
TUTO_14: Click here to download a picture or data.
TUTO_16: use this button to embebed the chart in other tools
TUTO_18: Use this option to change the language of the tool, it supports English, French or German.
TUTO_19: That is it for our tour.
TUTO_20: If you find this visualisation tool useful, please show your support by sharing it with others on Twitter, Facebook, email and LinkedIn. Thank you!
PROMO_TUTO_2: Welcome to Eurostat's energy monthly tool. For a guided tour of features click here and a tour will start!.
